title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Online Psychodynamic Psychotherapy Education for Borderline Personality Disorder

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in mental health, general understanding of psychotherapy
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can systematically explain the clinical symptoms and etiology of borderline personality disorder (BPD).
Learners can apply the fundamental principles of psychodynamic psychotherapy (e.g., transference, resistance, interpretation) to actual treatment cases.
Learners can master therapeutic skills by performing practice tasks based on the 4C/ID model (e.g., process recording analysis, dynamic formulation writing).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
